ygData.subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Diable 2
ygData.msgSnippet: I also got it, play it to lvl 10 barbarian.  Notice how many necro and sor out there?  KNN I think even pally is more than barb. The least shld be ama and
ygData.messageBody:
I also got it, play it to lvl 10 barbarian. Notice how many necro and sor
out there? KNN I think even pally is more than barb. The least shld be ama
and barb. I think there is a bug in D2. The last game which I play to lvl
10, kena kick out of game, and when I return, I go back to lvl 5!!!! *&%&%#

In the end play again till 3am, managed to get back to lvl 9 only. Good
thing is tat I find a very good staff tat increase quite a few of casting
skills and a set armor tunic. Both I used to 'twink' my sor later.

Any sor tips pls share, I'm training my barb to look for gp and magical
stuffs (barb got a skill to increase %age to find magical stuff).

I also go a luck amulet, which I found 2 fire, 2 ruby, 3 skull and 1 emer
gems after I wear it, but knn all these gems are gone when my char crashed.
Lucky I still got the amulet and found 1 fire, 1 ice and 1 skull gem
later...

On Friday, 30 June, 2000 4:08 AM, Davis Tuea [SMTP:dtfp@...]
wrote:
> Bought it .
>
> Play it .
>
> Now lvl 14 paly (argh... Paly is a black guy.... )
>
> Before i log off i was number 9 highest paly hehe.
>
> Really play like a bard hehe. I mostly use heal aura(ae healsong)
> and Holy Fire aura(ae fire dd song)
>
> Febon
